about.details:
Incorporated in 2010, Pune based Affordable Robotic & Automation Limited is a company engaged in the business of providing turnkey automation solution to automotive, semi-automotive and manufacturing industries.

The Company programs and automates the functions of machines used in manufacturing process of the automobile industry. The Assembly facility of the Company is situated at Pune, Maharashtra along with the Head office, covering an area of 8,442 sq. meters.

The Company is also in the business of assembling and installing automatic multilevel car parking system. This system is preferred by residential complexes, shopping malls, and commercial buildings. It has a presence in Mumbai and Pune in automated car-parking business. Further, in FY 2017-18, the Company has set-up a new line of business, Secondary Packaging, which is aimed at FMCG industries by way of providing automation service in container packaging of the final packed product.

faqs.question: What is the Affordable Robotic Automation IPO?
faqs.answer:
Affordable Robotic Automation IPO is a SME IPO of 3667200 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹31.17 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹85 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on May 24, 2018, and closes on May 28, 2018.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Affordable Robotic Automation IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Affordable Robotic Automation IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Affordable Robotic Automation IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Affordable Robotic Automation IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Affordable Robotic Automation IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: How to apply for Affordable Robotic Automation IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Affordable Robotic Automation IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
